info.title: kenzie-kars-api
info.description: Kenzie Kars API: A backend solution for vehicle e-commerce.

post.description: This route is responsible for creating a new user. The "name", "email", "password", "cpf", "phone", "birthdate", "description", and "address" fields are mandatory, and any additional fields sent will be ignored. It is not possible to create a user with an existing email. The password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character. The "address" field should include the following properties: "cep", "state", "city", "street_number", and "complement".

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

password: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.

409.description: Conflict - Attempt to create a user with an email that is already registered

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving a user's profile based on their token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

patch.description: This route is responsible for updating a user's data based on their token. The fields that can be updated include "name", "email", "password", "cpf", "phone", "birthdate", and "description". Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

409.description: Conflict - Attempt to update a user with an email that is already registered

400.description: Bad Request - Some fields are in an invalid format. Please ensure that all fields are provided correctly.

password: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.

delete.description: This route is responsible for deleting a user based on their token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

patch.description: This route is responsible for updating a user's address data based on their token. The fields that can be updated include "cep", "state", "city", "street_number", and "complement". Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

400.description: Bad Request - Some fields are in an invalid format. Please ensure that all fields are provided correctly.

cep: String must contain at most 9 character(s)

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving a user's vehicles based on their token.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permissions to perform this action

value.message: You don't have permissions to perform this action

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving vehicles belonging to a specific user.

post.description: This route is responsible for creating a new vehicle. The "brand", "model", "year", "fuel", "mileage", "color", "description", "price", and "cover_image" fields are mandatory. Additionally, an optional array of images can be provided, with a maximum of 6 images. Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permissions to perform this action

value.message: You don't have permissions to perform this action

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

value.message: The specified car model is not available in the internal car database.

get.description: This route is responsible for retrieving all vehicles.

put.description: This route is responsible for updating a vehicle. The "brand", "model", "year", "fuel", "mileage", "color", "description", "price", "cover_image", and "is_active" fields are mandatory. Additionally, an optional array of images can be provided, with a maximum of 6 images. Any additional fields sent will be ignored.

parameters.name: vehicleId
parameters.description: ID of the vehicle to update

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

404.description: Not Found - The specified vehicle ID does not exist.

403.description: Forbidden - You don't have permissions to perform this action

You don't have permissions to perform this action

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

value.message: The specified car model is not available in the internal car database.

delete.description: This route is responsible for deleting a vehicle based on its ID.

parameters.name: vehicleId
parameters.description: ID of the vehicle to delete

401.description: Unauthorized - No authorization token provided, the provided token has expired, or the token is invalid.

404.description: Not Found - The specified vehicle ID does not exist.

get.description: This route is responsible for get the maximum price and mileage.

post.description: This route is responsible for logging in a registered user. The "email" and "password" fields are mandatory, and any additional fields sent will be ignored. Upon successful login, an access token called "token" will be returned, which should be included in requests to routes that require authorization.

400.description: Bad Request - Some required fields were not sent or are in an invalid format. Please ensure all mandatory fields are provided correctly.

401.description: Unauthorized - The email or password is wrong.
